relation: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 02/28/2012 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Reporting date extended to Friday, April 27, 2012
Reporting date extended to Friday, June 8, 2012
Reporting date extended to Friday, July 13, 2012
Accompanied a study order, see S2440
title: Actions for Bill S.648
textBeforeTable: SECTION 34. Sixteenth, An automobile necessary for personal transportation or to secure or maintain employment, not exceeding three thousand two hundred-fifty dollars in value. Notwithstanding any other section or subsection of this Chapter 235 or Chapter 188, this Section 34 of Chapter 235 shall be subordinate to, and shall include any and all exemptions provided in 11 U.S.C. § 522(c) and 11 U.S.C. § 522(f). SECTION 34. Fourteenth, Estates of homestead as defined in chapter one hundred and eighty-eight or, in lieu thereof, the amount of money each rental period, not exceeding one thousand two hundred dollars per month, necessary to pay the rent for the dwelling unit occupied by him and his family. SECTION 34. Chapter 235 is amended by amending the following language in Section 34 as follows: Miscellaneous Bill History Bill Text Print Preview
